languages.text: "Я... понимаю". {n}Рубиновые глаза сияют еще ярче в обрамлении едва сдерживаемых слез.{/n} "Вижу, как ваши цвета рядом со мной тускнеют". {n}Девушка опускает взгляд.{/n} "Уходите. Позвольте мне побыть в одиночестве".

traits.locale_text: "Я... понимаю". {n}Рубиновые глаза сияют еще ярче в обрамлении едва сдерживаемых слез.{/n} "Вижу, как ваши цвета рядом со мной тускнеют". {n}Девушка опускает взгляд.{/n} "Уходите. Позвольте мне побыть в одиночестве".

languages.text: "I... I understand." {n}Her ruby eyes shine even more vividly when framed by barely restrained tears.{/n} "I have seen your colours growing dim when you are with me." {n}She looks down.{/n} "Go. Allow me to be alone."
languages.original_text: "Я... понимаю". {n}Рубиновые глаза сияют еще ярче в обрамлении едва сдерживаемых слез.{/n} "Вижу, как ваши цвета рядом со мной тускнеют". {n}Девушка опускает взгляд.{/n} "Уходите. Позвольте мне побыть в одиночестве".

traits.locale_text: "I... understand." {n}Her ruby eyes shine even more vividly when framed by barely restrained tears.{/n} "I have seen your colours growing dim when you are with me." {n}She looks down.{/n} "Go. Allow me to be alone."

"I... understand." {n}Her ruby eyes shine even more vividly when framed by barely restrained tears.{/n} "I have seen your colours growing dim when you are with me." {n}She looks down.{/n} "Go. Allow me to be alone."

"I... understand." {n}Her ruby eyes shine even more vividly when framed by barely restrained tears.{/n} "I have seen your colours growing dim when you are with me." {n}She looks down.{/n} "Go. Allow me to be alone."

"I... understand." {n}Her ruby eyes shine even more vividly when framed by barely restrained tears.{/n} "I have seen your colours growing dim when you are with me." {n}She looks down.{/n} "Go. Allow me to be alone."

languages.text: «Yo... lo entiendo». {n}Sus ojos de color rubí centellean con mayor intensidad debido a las lágrimas que apenas logra contener.{/n} «He notado que sus colores se atenuaban cuando estaba conmigo». {n}Baja la mirada.{/n} «Váyase. Quisiera estar sola».
languages.original_text: "I... I understand." {n}Her ruby eyes shine even more vividly when framed by barely restrained tears.{/n} "I have seen your colours growing dim when you are with me." {n}She looks down.{/n} "Go. Allow me to be alone."

traits.locale_text: «Yo... lo entiendo». {n}Sus ojos de color rubí centellean con mayor intensidad debido a las lágrimas que apenas logra contener.{/n} «He notado que sus colores se atenuaban cuando estaba conmigo». {n}Baja la mirada.{/n} «Váyase. Quisiera estar sola».

languages.text: 「そ…そうですね」{n}彼女のルビー色の目が以前にも増して明るく輝き、涙をグッとこらえているのが伺える。{/n}「私と一緒にいるとき、あなたの色が徐々にくすんでいくのに気づいていました」{n}彼女は目線を下にやった。{/n}「出て行ってください。しばらくひとりになりたいです」
languages.original_text: "I... I understand." {n}Her ruby eyes shine even more vividly when framed by barely restrained tears.{/n} "I have seen your colours growing dim when you are with me." {n}She looks down.{/n} "Go. Allow me to be alone."

traits.locale_text: 「そ…そうですね」{n}彼女のルビー色の目が以前にも増して明るく輝き、涙をグッとこらえているのが伺える。{/n}「私と一緒にいるとき、あなたの色が徐々にくすんでいくのに気づいていました」{n}彼女は目線を下にやった。{/n}「出て行ってください。しばらくひとりになりたいです」

languages.text: “我……能理解。”{n}她勉强克制着泪水，红宝石般的双眼显得更加鲜艳。{/n}“我已经看到了，当你和我在一起的时候，你的颜色变得越发暗淡。”{n}她低下了头。{/n}“你走吧，让我一个人静静。”
languages.original_text: "I... I understand." {n}Her ruby eyes shine even more vividly when framed by barely restrained tears.{/n} "I have seen your colours growing dim when you are with me." {n}She looks down.{/n} "Go. Allow me to be alone."

traits.locale_text: “我……能理解。”{n}她勉强克制着泪水，红宝石般的双眼显得更加鲜艳。{/n}“我已经看到了，当你和我在一起的时候，你的颜色变得越发暗淡。”{n}她低下了头。{/n}“你走吧，让我一个人静静。”

languages.text: {n}Ses yeux rubis brillent encore plus vivement sous l'effet des larmes qu'elle peine à retenir.{/n} « Je... comprends. J'ai vu vos couleurs s'éteindre lorsque vous êtes auprès de moi, {n}dit-elle en baissant la tête.{/n} Partez. Laissez-moi seule. »
languages.original_text: "I... I understand." {n}Her ruby eyes shine even more vividly when framed by barely restrained tears.{/n} "I have seen your colours growing dim when you are with me." {n}She looks down.{/n} "Go. Allow me to be alone."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ses yeux rubis brillent encore plus vivement sous l'effet des larmes qu'elle peine à retenir.{/n} « Je... comprends. J'ai vu vos couleurs s'éteindre lorsque vous êtes auprès de moi, {n}dit-elle en baissant la tête.{/n} Partez. Laissez-moi seule. »

languages.text: "Ich ... verstehe." {n}Ihre rubinfarbenen Augen leuchten noch strahlender, wenn sie von kaum zurückgehaltenen Tränen eingerahmt werden.{/n} "Ich habe gesehen, wie Eure Farben verblassen, wenn Ihr in meiner Nähe seid." {n}Sie blickt zu Boden.{/n} "Geht. Gestattet mir, allein zu sein."
languages.original_text: "I... I understand." {n}Her ruby eyes shine even more vividly when framed by barely restrained tears.{/n} "I have seen your colours growing dim when you are with me." {n}She looks down.{/n} "Go. Allow me to be alone."

traits.locale_text: "Ich ... verstehe." {n}Ihre rubinfarbenen Augen leuchten noch strahlender, wenn sie von kaum zurückgehaltenen Tränen eingerahmt werden.{/n} "Ich habe gesehen, wie Eure Farben verblassen, wenn Ihr in meiner Nähe seid." {n}Sie blickt zu Boden.{/n} "Geht. Gestattet mir, allein zu sein."

languages.original_text: "I... understand." {n}Her ruby eyes shine even more vividly when framed by barely restrained tears.{/n} "I have seen your colours growing dim when you are with me." {n}She looks down.{/n} "Go. Allow me to be alone."

languages.text: "Demek... Anlıyorum." {n}Zar zor tuttuğu gözyaşları, yakut kırmızısı gözlerini daha da ışıldatıyor.{/n} "Yanımdayken renklerinin sönükleştiğini fark etmiştim." {n}Bakışlarını yere kenetliyor.{/n} "Git. Bırak da yalnız kalayım."
languages.original_text: "I... I understand." {n}Her ruby eyes shine even more vividly when framed by barely restrained tears.{/n} "I have seen your colours growing dim when you are with me." {n}She looks down.{/n} "Go. Allow me to be alone."

traits.locale_text: "Demek... Anlıyorum." {n}Zar zor hâkim olduğu gözyaşları sayesinde, yakut kırmızısı gözleri her zamankinden bile daha parlak.{/n} "Yanımda olduğunda renklerinin solduğunu fark etmiştim." {n}Bakışlarını yere kenetliyor.{/n} "Git. Bırak da yalnız kalayım."
